website_summaries.verdict: This power-saving monitor saves your battery life: if baby is sleeping soundly, the camera also goes to sleep – but wakes immediately if any movement is detected.
pros: Easy to set up and connect both units
Camera monitors in real time with no delay
Can mount on tabletop or wall
Parents' unit is compact and lightweight
users report being able to take their unit outside and still see baby’s activities
cons: Feels less sturdy than some other models
Night vision is in black and white
Included instructions are not very thorough

website_summaries.verdict: This portable baby monitor makes it simple to keep an eye on your child at any time.
pros: Offers a real-time video connection so you can monitor your child without delay
Boasts a night-vision capability and provides crystal-clear images
Features temperature and sound monitoring capabilities
Can be paired with up to 4 cameras in different rooms
Comes with a user-friendly 2.4-inch color LED display
cons: Picture sometimes cuts in and out

customer_reviews.title: J-U-N-K Junk
customer_reviews.text: I'm baffled at how this item gets good reviews unless it had some major changes recently. The audio is terrible because there is so much static you can't hear whats going on near the sending unit. The reliable range is less than 60' in our house with no metal or concrete walls in between. The field of view of the camera is smaller than other monitors we've used. The brightness seems to auto adjust on its own randomly so it gets very bright and dim every couple minutes which is really annoying in the dark while you're trying to sleep at night. Maybe I got a dud but this thing was junk.
customer_reviews.author: Todd M Swanson

customer_reviews.title: We love this!
customer_reviews.text: The picture is good for the price. The battery life is no good. You need to keep it plugged in all night or it will wake you at 4am with a dying battery beeping. So far so good. We especially like the speaker feature. This is in our boys room downstairs and we can use it to talk to them to tell them to be quiet or go to bed. Also when our 3 year old wakes up in the night we use the music feature to lull him back to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Richard hughes

customer_reviews.title: Long Range Wifi Connectivity
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor! We live in a decent size home so finding a product that keeps a connection was super important to us. We can have BBQ's outside comfortably knowing our baby is safe without having to run in and put to check on him. The ECO feature allows us save battery life without being plugged in all day/night. Thanks Smilism! Just wish you offered the same brand additional cameras. Hopefully no problems pairing to Baby Sense monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Great baby monitor after 1st night!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally!!!! After trying two other monitors that used apps, I’ve found a good one!!! The other app required baby monitors kept kicking me out of them at night while trying to monitor my baby. This one worked fantastically all night long!! The Eco mode will also be nice if I can ever convince myself I don’t have to see my baby all night, but only when he makes noise. :) My only complaint so far is that it isn’t a wide angle lense and therefore I can only get his crib in view.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Amones

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I guess when I looked at reviews I missed some of the features that come with this monitor. It switches from day to night vision on its own. The camera plugs into the wall and is small and portable. The parent part can be fully charged and walked around with for up to 12 hours. There are 4 different lullabies and several settings for the alarm clock to go off in certain time intervals. I have felt much better about our 16 month old sleeping on his own knowing I can check on him at any time without disturbing him. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Poyner

customer_reviews.title: Grandparents best friend
customer_reviews.text: Needed a baby monitor for the grand baby. It's portable let's us get things done while the G-baby sleeps, or not
customer_reviews.author: Norm Hilburn

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to set up. But the signal can be weak. I am in my office which is not very far from our bedroom. It will constantly show connection broken. Updated after using for couple of hours. I am in my office which is not very far from our bedroom. The connection keeps broken. (see image). Very disappointed. Had to return. Initially, we like it and even want to recommend to others. Now we don't recommend. The image quality is fairly good. If there is no connection issue, we would keep it. The music included is very limited and not very good as well.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: then all of a sudden loose signal in the same rooms it previously was fine in. This DOES NOT happen all the time
customer_reviews.text: They work well...but occasionally look signal. It’ll work in all rooms of my house, then all of a sudden loose signal in the same rooms it previously was fine in. This DOES NOT happen all the time, very speratic...I would still recommend...the video is phenomenal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karl C.

customer_reviews.title: Battery does not last
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews before buying this... and I thought I would give it the benefit of doubt but... everyone that complained about the battery was correct! The charger it came with didn’t last a month before it stopped working.... now just barely over a year since we got it... it can’t be used with out being plugged in to the wall witch completely defeats the purpose of the monitor... not worth the waste of money because your going to end up having to buy another on...
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Birley

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to be used for my baby's nursery room and it worked fine for the first 3 months. And then one day, just stopped working all together. Now it keeps saying that it is waiting for connection with the camera and it never connects. I tried to reset it and unplug/plug it back in too. I would not recommend this product since it only lasted 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Hiral Patel

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 months. We only have 1 camera in our home and it keeps unpairing and trying to connect to cameras that are not available. I tried to follow the instructions to repair it and it doesn't work. Also, the date is stuck on December and won't change no matter how many times I have manually changed it. The instructions also say that the picture can be seen in landscape mode by flipping the camera - this feature doesn't work either. The seller appears to have disappeared off of Amazon and is not responding to requests to help resolve this! Edited to add that the camera that I received is not the one that's pictured!
customer_reviews.author: MsCPA2012

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I looked at what felt like hundreds of baby monitors before deciding on this one based on the other reviews here. We were just looking for a simple audio/video monitor and at less than $100, this one was perfect. It even has extra "bells and whistles" that we haven't used yet, like playing music in the baby's room. The camera was easy to install and the monitor is light and portable. I also really like that it displays the room temperature. I do wish it had a better battery life, which is why I gave it four out of five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Christina H.

customer_reviews.title: Battery not great
customer_reviews.text: I liked the monitor, thought it served its purpose well. We began using the monitor in June of 2018, and now in August of 2019 it’s starting to not work. It just randomly shuts off, and I wake up in a panic and find myself having to continually turn it back on. The battery is not dead as we leave it on the charger at night, it really just shuts itself off. Have to get something else now. Only used for a year so, that’s disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Cady D.

customer_reviews.title: Monitor stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Hi I am mother of 2 toddler - one 22 months and one 4 years old. I bought this product as I read good reviews on Amazon. However after barely 5 months of gentle use the baby monitor stopped working. The monitor screen was going blank, blurry sometimes shows no connection. And from monitor there was constant noise coming. I liked this product as It was not too costly but if it doesn't work for even 5 months than it is not worth. I gave 2 stars as it worked for few months.
customer_reviews.author: Jigar S.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Let's go to the good news first. I liked que camera quality, specially the night vision and the "ECHO" feature. However this product has a really (REALLY) terrible battery, it last only for 6 or 7 hours. It's awful being awakened in the middle of the night by the "low battery beep". There is no button to turn off the camera, so to turn it off I have to manually pull the plug from the wall outlet. Botton line: this device looks like a good prototype... but a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio D.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped holding charge after 1 year!
customer_reviews.text: For the first year our monitor was great. We could go all over the house and the signal would reach. The picture quality was good too. Just a few days past the one year mark, our monitor stopped holding a charge or charging at all. It's very unreliable at night. It could shut off even when plugged in and we can't hear our daughter if she wakes up. We have to buy a new monitor now and that's ridiculous seeing that we paid good money for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright...
customer_reviews.text: It works alright, the video clarity is good. The little monitor used to view the baby has a terrible battery that doesn’t last long so you have to keep it charging all the time. The signal is also easily interrupted. I can’t use my laptop next to it or it will cut out the feed.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Day

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but not built to last
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this in March 2019 after hearing good things from a friend. It worked really well for us until Dec 2019 (for 9 months). Now, the parent unit won't hold a charge -- after being plugged in all night, once unplugged, it beeps and soon shuts off. And it is constantly turning eco mode/screen on and off -- the display and sound is activated every minute and a half. Our house and neighborhood are very quiet at night, so the microphone shouldn't be picking up noise this frequently. When this monitor system worked, it worked well. But doesn't seem to be built to last more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Just a regular mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great monitor. Picture quality and sound is good. The only issue is night vision. The photo is clear however the screen keeps changing colors like it can’t focus and it makes a sound. Other than that, every thing is fine. Have not had any issues with reach, we even take it out in our garage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Highly recommend@
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Small picture but more than sufficient for observation. Does the job very well. Durable. Easy to pack, great for travel. Sound quality is good. Excellent battery life. Great product! Great value.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Out of range. Pointless
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't connect. Out of range unless in the same room... kinda pointless. Need to keep eyes on the little guy in the next room. Disappointed was a good price and had decent review. But didnt work for me
customer_reviews.author: Ana Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works great for over a year now
customer_reviews.text: Use this for my puppies, for the second pup now, that means it is on for over a year now, and it still works perfect. I for sure would buy this again, and i can also recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Real Man

customer_reviews.title: Loses visual a lot
customer_reviews.text: It loses connection so much. And i live in a one story ranch so it’s not even that far apart. The picture is fine when it works and the night vision is great too. To bad it can’t stay connected. I had it running for just nap and lost signal about 5 times. And it went fuzzy about every 2 mins. And for the price that’s not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kati

customer_reviews.title: Not working anymore and only been 4 months
customer_reviews.text: This video monitor worked awesome. So much better than our expensive one that had no battery life. We bought this March 2019 and July 2019 it has completely gone out the chargers don’t stay in the charge anymore and the screen just says disconnection. Can’t figure out a way to fix. Have tried everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE!!! Broke after 5 months! Warranty is only 3 MONTHS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product due to the high reviews and reasonable cost, but the monitor broke after only 5 months of use. The picture started going in and out, eventually going black. In addition, the wireless connection stopped working consistently, thus, making it unusable as just an audio monitor as well. I am very disappointed in the lack of quality since it only lasted a short period of time. Since the warranty in only 3 months I have no way to get my money back or get a replacement without paying for the monitor again. Be cautious when buying this product...you definitely get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: NLKel

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this before my baby was due to we'd be prepared and it simply doesn't connect. Both units plug in and the control unit charges without a problem, but the unit with the camera does not connect. The troubleshooting guide explains that just about any other signal will interrupt the connection, including wifi. I tried it with the units right next to one another and in two separate rooms with no luck. This is an expensive item and it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Eco mode is great, after 30s with no sound it stops doing the noise sound so you can relax. You can actually set the sound sensitivity to three scales. The most sensitive one catches almost anything in the bedroom. The two-way communication is really good. Camera is also good and you can see in the dark with good quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. Penedo

customer_reviews.title: bad features, broke after just 3 months
customer_reviews.text: only had it 3 months and now it won't charge at all, if I unplug the screen it shuts off, I've left it off to charge for hours and it still won't come on without being plugged in
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Broke after just a few months
customer_reviews.text: The part where the cord attached to the monitor broke after only a few months of use. Cheap, junky monitor. I should have just paid more and gotten a nest like I wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: I liked this camera, but it's battery life is very short, i bought it for checking my infant baby's room. But the battery is just for less than 8_9 hours. This product problem is just the battery. Everything is great
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Momther

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Happy to have it when I babysit my young grandson
customer_reviews.author: globejolie

customer_reviews.title: This camera is awesome! Picture is super clear
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome! Picture is super clear, and I love the ECO mode. We play music in our daughters room all night, and it will still only pick up the sounds of her crying or making noise! So i dont have to listen to the music all night through the monitor as well. I sleep much better! I will say as others did, the cord is short, so you have to set the camera on something vs. hang it on the wall. Not a deal breaker for me. Great monitor for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beeps all night!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this monitor for a few months but have just started to use it for our little one in his own room. The picture is great but the monitor constantly looses service. All night long we hear the monitor beeping looking for service. We had to stop using it and are using our old monitor instead.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Riggs

customer_reviews.title: This was our spare monitor. Used it twice and ...
customer_reviews.text: This was our spare monitor. Used it twice and camera no longer connects to the base. 85 dollars down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pereira

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor! Perfect picture, long battery, great sound and controls, and the ability to talk to your baby or play music. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor...but two cameras. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Best value for non WiFi. I’d recommend this and I would buy it again. I would recommend getting two cameras as we found we were moving it often. Would be easier to have one stationary and another camera for placing around the house in different areas.
customer_reviews.author: mp

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made - do not purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: The cord looked cheaply made from the beginning! I almost returned it immediately and now I wish I would have! it broke into two pieces! spend a little bit more and buy one that will last!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Skip this monitor. Battery doesn’t hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a replacement for our old monitor that lasted 3 years. This monitor is terrible and only turns on if connected to a power source. Worst baby buy for us.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for 3 months. Wont charge at all for me. Nothing hut issues just shuts off my sone was screaming the one night and it just shut off luckily I heard him but not sure how long he was crying. Definitely wouldn't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie De

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Works great night vision is cler and you can talk to your baby on ot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Hate hate hate this baby monitor. It is lightweight and cheap feeling, and it keeps disconnecting from the camera at random times, Day and night, beeping loudly for no reason. The picture also goes light to dark to light to dark any time I have the video on. Cheaply made and not worth your money!
customer_reviews.author: J105

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for the price
customer_reviews.text: It does feel cheaply mad but it does the job for us and picks up on sounds and noises when in use. I’d buy again if needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The battery dies very quickly. Needs to aleays be plugged in. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: albita77

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: We loved this until the monitor screen went out in less than three months of very gentle use (for a few 30 min naps during the day). The screen is now all white with no picture, there is still sound. The night vision, sound and range were all good, but very disappointed we now have to buy a new monitor so soon. *Update July 3, 2019: The sound is now going out as well.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well so far for the past few months. No problems. Clear video and sound. I like that u can talk back, or play music 🎶
customer_reviews.author: V🌺

customer_reviews.title: Amazing range high quality product
customer_reviews.text: Best Buy ever! Easy, perfect size, excellent resolution, sound and range! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: raqui t

customer_reviews.title: Connection is sketchy
customer_reviews.text: Pros: easy connect, compact Cons: connection is inconsistent and beeps throughout the night when connection is lost. We live in a 1500 sq ft house with a direct shot from my room to my daughters room.
customer_reviews.author: mereimahog

customer_reviews.title: How do I return this?
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this with some money we were gifted for our baby. It has set in our closet until we were ready to move her to her own room. New, fresh from the box and charged and it won't work. How do i return this?
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: causing annoying bright flashing on screen
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Temperature indicator Decent image Cons: -Disconnects/ reconnects often, causing annoying bright flashing on screen, even when in the same room -Screen is super bright, even with the dimming option -camera always needs to be plugged in, in order to work
customer_reviews.author: Cee

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be made of good quality. Does the job as expected. Surely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rockstar

customer_reviews.title: I definitely trust that my baby will be ok with the camera on her.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing day and night vision, battery life and range. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Chester T.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended at all
customer_reviews.text: This monitor broke within 60 days of purchase. Not recommended at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound
customer_reviews.text: Everything is ok with the camera. But the sound is terrible. It has a constant static noise that make it hard for me to sleep and to hear what is happening with my baby. I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After you turn off the monitor and turn it back on there is no picture, just sound. It takes 20-30 times of turning it on and off for the picture to come up. This a cheap material product and it’s not worth the price at all. Im mad I threw away the box, otherwise I would be returning it. Don’t waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Coulter

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money and get a different camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera worked for 6 months and now it won’t shut off! We have to keep it plugged in and the screen stays on all the time and gets super hot. Spend the extra money and get a different camera!
customer_reviews.author: Booney

customer_reviews.title: Stops charging! Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: After only 8 month, the monitor stopped charging. Tried different charges and it doesn't make a difference. Not worth paying this much for having to trash it.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and great customer service. Our charger stopped working and they sent one out right away! It started right up with the new charger, thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Good product but quality control is needed bedore shipping
customer_reviews.text: I like the baby monitor. It‘s easy to use but there is a red line on the left side of the screen. It's a bit annoying but overall I am pleased with the product. I simply didn't want to go through the trouble of returning the monitor for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fluellen

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This thing has no range and the digital gets disrupted if you use WiFi while it’s on. Don’t buy it unless you live in a small apartment and won’t be using WiFi!
customer_reviews.author: MiamiMamma

customer_reviews.title: The screen is smaller than I wanted
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok monitor. The screen is small. And the close up view isn’t as clear as I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Chu

customer_reviews.title: Not charging correctly
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for about 9 months. At first I was very pleased with product but unfortunately now it's not charging! Very unhappy!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlett Rose Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The construction quality feels poor and FakeSpot says that most of the reviews that were posted when I bought it were artificial, but it does what it says it does. Good sound and video transmission. Automatically adjusts between color and night-vision depending on the light level. Thermometer seems accurate. It's a lot of features for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt O

customer_reviews.title: Needs to come with stronger battery
customer_reviews.text: Not much battery life without keeping plugged in, no other complaints
customer_reviews.author: ted workman

customer_reviews.title: Under six months it broke!
customer_reviews.text: Broke in under six months, have yet to hear back from the company. We even bought the protection plan for this item as well. What a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Came without plastic wrap on box so I wa worries it was used but it works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Shipley

customer_reviews.title: This monitor stopped working for me in 3 months. ...
customer_reviews.text: This monitor stopped working for me in 3 months. Even in close range, we get nothing but a "waiting for connection" screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So flimsy. Too small not good quality and didn’t not like it for the cost
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and doesn’t beep at you in the middle of the night like some others
customer_reviews.author: Wjh

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS FOR MY COUSIN FOR HER 1ST BABY GIRL
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thumbs up for customer service. Ordered 2 instead of 1, my fault, customer service helps me sort it out. Product looks nice. Really big screen with great quality night video and sound. Never had any problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W Allen Jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works fantastic! At night you can see baby’s movements. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pure Angle View
customer_reviews.text: Pure angle view. Not possible to change view. Loosing connection quiet often. Low quality
customer_reviews.author: Anil Turpcu

customer_reviews.title: The connection between camera and display is terrible. When the connection fail
customer_reviews.text: The connection between camera and display is terrible. When the connection fail, and this happens every day, there are a annoying song to wake up. I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Flavio Quintela

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Good camera. Nice picture quality but the sound randomly goes out and the camera cannot be adjusted remotely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: “Waiting for connection”
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product at all. Always “waiting for connection”. I would not recommend it. Look into other options
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Inocencio

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. Does anyone know how to add another ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Does anyone know how to add another camera. There is a scan option if there is another camera but can’t find just another camera on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Mama K

customer_reviews.title: Unit isn’t charging anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I’m upset because I have only had the unit for 6 months. It’s not charging anymore when plugged into the wall???? Can I replace the battery? No instructions....
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT hold charge
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great for the first 6 month but now will not hold a charge. Has to constantly be on the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Only two things could make this better. A longer lasting battery and if you could adjust the camera without moving it. Otherwise we got this after our child turned one because he started making a lot of noise. If we checked on him then it would start the timer of him falling asleep over! Now we can see if he is just making a ton of noise or actually something we need to check on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Range isn’t quite as good as reported but in general it’s a very nice device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This monitor broke after less then 6 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Isom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to try it when the baby arrives <3
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Quesada

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this monitor. I am very pleased with it .
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: We loved this monitor, but the video went out in less than a year and customer service did not respond to the email they listed for issues.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: bought for my granddaughter who is bed ridden and needs constant monitoring. Works beautifully, so happy with this purchase. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: motherbeatrice

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As a parent of four, I only wish I had bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and clear picture !
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor! Easy to set up and it’s great quality!
customer_reviews.author: robin ward

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It is extremely easy to set up and is everything we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Interferes with WiFi
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in the same room with my 2.4 GHz wireless router. All of a sudden my WiFi was unreliable. I unplugged the monitor. The WiFi problems went away. I plugged the monitor back in. The problems returned. At that point I just returned it.

product_meta.title: Video Baby Monitor with Camera [2019 Upgraded] Night Vision, Two-Way Talk Audio, Temperature Sensor, ECO Mode, 2.4" Color Screen, Long Transmission Range (2.4 inch Baby moniotr Set)
feature_bullets: 💎 REAL-TIME VIDEO AND VOICE & EASY CONNECTION - The baby monitor with camera can allow you to monitor the baby’s activities in real time without any delay. The baby monitor can be connected by holding the Pair button for a few seconds.

💎 TWO-WAY TALK & NIGHT VISION - The two-way talking baby monitor with camera and audio can soothe and talk to your baby with the sound of your own voice. Night vision image is clear in black and white.

💎 ECO MODE & TEMPERATURE MONITORING - This sound-activated baby monitor will turn on/off the screen automatically when sound/no sound is detected by the unit. The temperature sensor helps you observe the room temperature all day long without worries.

💎 LONG RANGE TRANSMISSION & 2.4"COLOR LED DISPLAY - The baby monitor with camera covers a wide range of transmission that allows you to keep an eye on your loved one. The high definition display presents the live performance of your baby.
💎 OTHER FEATURES - Tabletop or wall mounting; Portable size is convenient to carry; Manual rotation video baby camera; This baby monitor can be paired with up to 4 cameras in different rooms.

specifications.Safety warning: Read User Guide before installing and using the product
